title: Developer | Designer | Data Analyst
description: Focused on performance, design and quality.
abtText: I am a Junior Fullstack Developer focused on Java backend and React.js frontend, working on the development of complete web applications, from business logic to user interface. I work with the creation and consumption of REST APIs, frontend and backend integration, and data persistence in relational databases. I have practical experience with Java, React.js, SQL, and Python, using PostgreSQL and MySQL, as well as version control with Git. I work on fullstack application development, process automation, system integration, code maintenance, and bug fixing, following good organizational and development practices. I have experience implementing backend functionalities, building interfaces in React.js, analyzing technical requirements, basic testing, and process documentation. I have a solid foundation in web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focusing on high-performance and well-structured applications. I am seeking opportunities as a Junior Fullstack Developer, working with Java, React.js, REST APIs, and SQL databases, where I can grow technically and contribute consistently to real-world projects.
